page.title: 16Annual Events in Arundel
page.content: This year Arundel played host again to international cricket touring sides from Australia and Zimbabwe who played their first match against Lavinia, Duchess of Norfolk's XI in the splendid castle grounds. The{Arundel Festival}at the end of August opened with a carnival procession of floats and bands. The Festival features: concerts, recitals, plays, revues, films, art and craft exhibitions, dances, races etc. The { {Torchlight Procession }through the town culminated round a large bonfire, bring the Festival to its close. The{Bath Tub}race took place this year on 18 September. Over a hundred strange craft set off at high tide to race to the bridge at Littlehampton, with thousands lining the river bank to cheer them on.
